personalInfo.name: Giorgio
personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate solution architect, making useful application using the latest technologies!

responsabilities: Design and implementation of scalable, reliable and cost-effective architectures on premise and Cloud Azure.
More than 10 years in .NET development using different platforms and technologies
Analyze technical requirements in order to define suitable enterprise solutions
Set up Proof of Concepts (PoCs) to demonstrate product capabilities
Manage projects to delivery, coordinating activities and people
Training on the job and slides presentation for co-workers and customers
Primary responsibilities include design and development of enterprise applications with Microsoft technologies including .NET Framework, Azure and SharePoint
I have a good management experience of small/medium teams
During the last years I have worked almost exclusively on Portal Technologies, Content and Enterprise Management Systems, responsible over the entire life cycle, providing innovative solutions.
Technical Designer and Java Developer in Italian and European research projects
Italian Project 'Multicast Multimedia Mobile Services (M3CAST)' to provide unified and convergent services over DVB / UMTS / WiFi networks
FP7 European Project 'Smart hoMes for ALL' (SM4ALL), in which I have designed and developed the Orchestration Engine and Rule Engine components
